an3.112:1.3: Atite, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati;
an3.112:1.4: anagate, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati;
an3.112:1.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati.
an3.112:1.6: Kathanca, bhikkhave, atite chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati?
an3.112:1.7: Atite, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti.
an3.112:1.8: Tassa atite chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakkayato anuvicarayato chando jayati.
an3.112:1.10: Etamaham, bhikkhave, samyojanam vadami yo cetaso sarago.
an3.112:1.11: Evam kho, bhikkhave, atite chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati.
an3.112:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, anagate chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati?
an3.112:2.2: Anagate, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti.
an3.112:2.3: Tassa anagate chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakkayato anuvicarayato chando jayati.
an3.112:2.5: Etamaham, bhikkhave, samyojanam vadami yo cetaso sarago.
an3.112:2.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, anagate chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati.
an3.112:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati?
an3.112:3.2: Paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti.
an3.112:3.3: Tassa paccuppanne chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha cetasa anuvitakkayato anuvicarayato chando jayati.
an3.112:3.5: Etamaham, bhikkhave, samyojanam vadami yo cetaso sarago.
an3.112:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando jayati.
an3.112:3.7: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayaya.
an3.112:4.3: Atite, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati;
an3.112:4.4: anagate, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati;
an3.112:4.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati.
an3.112:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, atite chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati?
an3.112:5.2: Atitanam, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniyanam dhammanam ayatim vipakam pajanati.
an3.112:5.4: Tadabhinivattetva cetasa abhinivijjhitva pannaya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:5.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, atite chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati.
an3.112:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, anagate chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati?
an3.112:6.2: Anagatanam, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniyanam dhammanam ayatim vipakam pajanati.
an3.112:6.4: Tadabhinivattetva cetasa abhinivijjhitva pannaya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:6.5: Evam kho, bhikkhave, anagate chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati.
an3.112:7.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati?
an3.112:7.2: Paccuppannanam, bhikkhave, chandaragatthaniyanam dhammanam ayatim vipakam pajanati, ayatim vipakam viditva tadabhinivatteti, tadabhinivattetva cetasa abhinivijjhitva pannaya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:7.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaragatthaniye dhamme arabbha chando na jayati.
an3.112:7.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayaya”ti.
